title: UAE pledges $1 billion for African AI expansion amid scrutiny over Sudan conflict ties
description: The United Arab Emirates unveiled a $1 billion artificial intelligence (AI) initiative at the G20 summit, positioning AI as key to economic and social development. The announcement comes amid UN investigations linking Abu Dhabi to Sudan’s Rapid Support Forces (RSF), accused of atrocities, with evidence of AI-generated propaganda and weapon supplies. UAE-Africa trade hit $107B […]
content:

title: Trump launches AI 'Genesis Mission' with Apollo space race as inspiration
description: President Trump on Monday signed an executive order creating a federal "Genesis mission" to support US dominance in artificial intelligence.
content: WASHINGTON — President Trump on Monday signed an executive order creating a federal “Genesis mission” to support US dominance in artificial intelligence — with officials comparing it to the Apollo Program that landed men on the moon during the space ... [3095 chars]

title: Burry Defends His Nvidia Criticism as Company Pushes Back
description: Michael Burry is standing by his criticism of Nvidia Corp. even after a report said the leading artificial intelligence company pushed back on his analysis.
